readability_reflection: string concatnetation felt more readable because it was easier to understand the syntax and the + sign was very intuitive
comprehension_debugging: I usually took more time for interpolation because the curly braces made it look more confusing.
preference_rationale: i would prefer concatenation because it is a lot easier to read and it only requires one key stroke instead of adding curly braces. it also helps me better understand my own code.
learning_curve: I did not have much experiences with both but the little experience I had with concatenation made it a little easier only because I have seen examples of concatenation before.
suggestions_improvement: change interpolation to a similar thing as intuitive as concatenation. Similar to how + only requires one character, it makes it easier to read.
